title: DDFP 607: Week 6 recap & Chargers chances of winning the division
itunes:title: DDFP 607: Week 6 recap & Chargers chances of winning the division
description:
Dave Dameshek is first joined by Ike Taylor to discuss the Steelers Week 6 victory of the Chiefs, highlighting the impressive performance by the defense and shutting down the rumors about Martavis Bryant (9:00). Then, Maurice Jones-Drew and Colleen Wolfe join the show to talk about MJD’s UCLA Hall of Fame induction ceremony (17:50) and if the Eagles are the best team in the NFC now that the Packers are without Aaron Rodgers (30:33). Plus, in this week’s edition of the Q&A, the group answers questions from pro football players and loyal members of the Shek Republic (35:40).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
